00040 class KoreanNounFilter: public Analyzer{
00041         WK_Knowledge* pK;
00042         WK_Eojul*     pE;
00043         WK_Analyzer*  pA;
00044 public:
00045 
00046         static const int sTagSetNOUN_  = (NNG|NNP|NNU|NNR);
00047         static const int sTagSetNOUN2_ = (NNP|NNU);
00048         static const int sTagSetJOSA_  = (JK|JX|JC|VC);
00049         static const int sTagSetVERB_  = (VV|VA|VX);
00050         static const int sTagSetEOMI_  = (EM|ETM|ETN|EP);
00051 
00052         KoreanNounFilter(string knowledgePath = "../resource/knowledge"){
00053                 cout << "Loading Korean POS model..." ;
00054                 pK = WK_Knowledge::createObject();
00055                 pK->loadKnowledge  (knowledgePath.c_str());     // Load data from knowledge file by default
00056                 pK->loadUserNoun   ( knowledgePath.c_str());   // Default filename is "user.dic"    // pK->loadUserNoun   ( "./knowledge", "user.dic" );
00057                 pK->loadPreAnalysis( knowledgePath.c_str());    // Default filename is "preanal.dic" // pK->loadPreAnalysis( "./knowledge", "preanal.dic" );
00058 
00059                 pE = WK_Eojul::createObject();
00060 
00061                 pE->initialize( true );
00062 
00063                 pA = WK_Analyzer::createObject( pK, pE );
00064                 pA->setExOption( TAGGING );
00065                 pA->setOption( WKO_OPTION_N_BEST, 1 ); 
00066 
00067                 cout << "finish!" << endl;
00068         }
00069         ~KoreanNounFilter()
00070         {
00071                 delete pK;
00072                 delete pE;
00073                 delete pA;
00074         }
00075 
00076         bool analyze(const TermList& Input, TermList& Output);
00077 
00078         bool analyze( TermList& InOutPut);
00079 };
00080
